attributes.action: To preserve Hamish MacInnes house  into a historic landmark as a museum
attributes.background: To not allow the stain of an evil man overshadow the accomplishments of Hamish MacInnes, a true mountaineer of Scotland! Mountaineers all over the world can visit to see how it was done with artifacts etc provided by locals and historians who knew Hamish and relive his stories for generations

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about this house are a matter for The Highland Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can petition The Highland Council here:

https://www.highland.gov.uk/info/670/consultations_complaints_and_compliments/622/consultations_and_petitions/2
